thread.title: BRIEF-Pioneer Natural Resources Co To Sell Selected Eagle Ford Shale Acreage For $102 Mln

title: BRIEF-Pioneer Natural Resources Co To Sell Selected Eagle Ford Shale Acreage For $102 Mln

organizations.name: brief-pioneer natural resources co to sell selected eagle ford

text: March 27, 2018 / 10:43 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Pioneer Natural Resources Co To Sell Selected Eagle Ford Shale Acreage For $102 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 27 (Reuters) - Pioneer Natural Resources Co: * PRESS RELEASE - PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES COMPANY ANNOUNCES SALE OF SELECTED EAGLE FORD SHALE ACREAGE FOR $102 MILLION * PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES CO - THE APPROXIMATELY 10,200 NET ACRES IS LOCATED IN ATASCOSA, LASALLE, LIVE OAK AND MCMULLEN COUNTIES, TEXAS * PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES - CURRENT NET PRODUCTION IS ABOUT 1,100 BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT PER DAY FOR THE SELECTED EAGLE FORD SHALE ACREAGE * PIONEER NATURAL RESOURCES CO - ‍AFTER SALE CLOSES, PIONEER’S ACREAGE POSITION IN EAGLE FORD SHALE WILL BE ABOUT 59,000 NET ACRES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
